detail_desc: Short-sleeved, V-neck tunic in soft denim with pin-tucks around the neckline, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an opening and ties at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the front. 3/4-length sleeves with slits at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lightly padded cups with removable inserts, double adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Seamless. Light support.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and a foot strap with concealed elastication. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long kimono woven in a patterned linen blend with long sleeves, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and detachable tie belt at the waist. Pockets in the side seams and a long slit at the back.
Sandals in suede and sturdy woven fabric with straps that tie around the ankles and wedge heels covered in braided jute. Leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 8 cm.
Leather slides with a braided foot strap, leather insoles and rubber soles.
Bikini briefs in soft stretch fabric with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back. Seamless.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long nightshirt in a cool, patterned viscose weave with rounded notch lapels and buttons down the front. Open chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and ties at the waistband. Wrapover front and side pockets. Unlined.
Straight-cut coat in soft, stretch imitation suede with a small stand-up collar, detachable tie belt at the waist and no fasteners. Patch front pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Sandals in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at one side and a loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Maxi dress in an airy modal weave with a V-neck, pin-tucks at the top and buttons down the front. Short sleeves with gathered seams and a decorative tie detail, seam with a drawstring at the waist and slits in the sides.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in soft satin. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Leggings in ribbed jersey with ribbing and a decorative bow with pompoms at the waist. Sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Dress in a slub-knit cotton blend with short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a braided tie belt with glittery threads and a rounded hem. Brushed inside.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cold shoulder dress in sturdy jersey with a flounce at the top, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and a fake flap pocket at the back. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.
Imitation leather trainers with a hook and loop fastening at the front, padded top edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

prod_name: 2 pk Dad & Kid polka dot OL
detail_desc: Set of two pairs of socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. One pair in an adult size (6.5-10.5) and one pair in a child size.
Jumper in a soft knit with a cable-knit front, wrapover shawl collar with a button, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins), seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Fitted turtleneck top in cotton jersey. Seam with a small frill trim at the top and overlocked edges around the neck, frill, cuffs and hem.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in washed cotton twill with a high waist and wide, tapered legs with decorative seams at the hems.
Knee-length shorts in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Metal earrings with faceted sparkly stones at the top and a rectangular plastic pendant at the bottom. Length 7 cm.

Knee-length cargo shorts in a stretch cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets with decorative seams, flap back pockets with concealed press-studs and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-studs.
Long gloves in supple leather with a soft suede inset section along the shaft, decorative seams on the uppers and a cotton jersey lining.
Quilted top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length skirt in a silk blend with a high waist and concealed zip in one side.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with lace over the shoulders. Round neckline with decorative gathers.
Sandals in imitation suede with straps over the foot and ribbed elastic around the heel. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered block heels, 6.5 cm.
Pyjama bottoms in ribbed jersey. Regular waist with a visible elastic waistband and wide legs with overlocked hems.
Nightdress in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Checked coat in a sturdy weave with a collar in wide-wale corduroy with buttons down the front, side pockets, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined.
Short dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck with lacing. Frill trim over the shoulders, short sleeves with frill trims and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Unlined.

Trainers in shimmering imitation leather with a print motif on one side, adjustable hook and loop tabs at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester, and transparent soles with motion-activated flashing LED lights in various colours.

Outdoor jacket with light padding front and back in woven fabric, a lined hood and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and side sections. Partly lined.
Top in jersey with a sheen. The top has short, wide butterfly sleeves.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in a patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a smocked bodice with a frill trim at the top, a seam at the waist and long, wide legs.
Poncho in a patterned weave containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a fringed hem. No fasteners.
Set with a hat, gloves and scarf in a soft, fine knit. Double-layered hat with a small appliqué on the turned-up hem. Gloves with ribbed cuffs.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing at the cuffs and hem and a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front.
Imitation leather waist belt with a round buckle with plastic pearly beads. Width 2.5 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in a soft cotton blend.
Baby Exclusive. Suede ballet pumps with a scalloped edge and strap with a hook and loop fastener. Cotton linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Warm-lined jacket in washed, stretch cotton denim with a collar and press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, fake flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets. Soft faux shearling lining.
Baby Exclusive. Hairbands in a braided cotton weave with covered elastication at the back.
Microfibre and lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Elasticated hairbands in various materials and designs with a decorative bow.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Longjohns in soft organic cotton jersey with and elasticated waist, button fly and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Sports bra in jacquard-patterned, fast-drying functional fabric with a V-neck at the front, a V-neck racer back and wide elasticated hem. Light support.
Dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the shoulders.
Gently flared dress in a double layer of embroidered tulle with an opening and button at the back of the neck, gathers at the top and short, flounced sleeves. Lined.
Slingbacks in imitation suede with pointed toes and covered elastication at the heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Padded gilet in windproof, water repellent functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped inner pocket. Polyester filling. Lined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.

Long-sleeved body in stretch fabric with a stand-up collar, opening front and back, and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Seam at the hips, a microfibre lower section and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Straight-cut, long-sleeved top in jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and a print motif.
Padded, fabric-covered Alice band.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and back pocket. Legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.

Sleeveless dress in glittery tulle with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist with a sewn-in velvet ribbon and bow, and a straight-cut skirt with several layers of pleated flounces. Lined.
5-pocket, slim-fit shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly with a button.

Shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a collar, button placket and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button. Side pockets, a narrow detachable belt and rounded hem. Unlined.
